Jenius Engineering weekly #10

Aug 16, 2017 • dedenf • newsletter •

Welcome to Jenius Engineering newsletter #10, this newsletter published every tuesday-ish. please subscribe to our newsletter, this newsletter is a bit late.

Later this week we will celebrating our independence day! here are reading lists for your brain for this almost long weekend.
